CustomField.description: Map of keys (tab name) to a boolean value. ie. {"One-Time Membership": true} Possible keys include: Gift, Pledge, Recurring, One-Time Membership, Auto Renewing Membership, Installment Based Membership Membership tabs are set to true by default If true, refreshes page information for the specified tab after user changes the Constituent/Organization in xGP
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Map of keys (tab name) to a boolean value. ie. {"One-Time Membership": true} Possible keys include: Gift, Pledge, Recurring, One-Time Membership, Auto Renewing Membership, Installment Based Membership Membership tabs are set to true by default If true, refreshes page information for the specified tab after user changes the Constituent/Organization in xGP
CustomField.label: xGP Tab Refresh Configuration
